mapper.update: update cl_borrow set user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, order_no = #{orderNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, amount = #{amount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, real_amount = #{realAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, fee = #{fee,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, time_limit = #{timeLimit,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, state = #{state,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, again = #{again,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, card_id = #{cardId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, service_fee = #{serviceFee,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, info_auth_fee = #{infoAuthFee,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, interest = #{interest,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, client = #{client,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, address = #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, coordinate = #{coordinate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, remark = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ip = #{ip,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sign_service_id = #{signServiceId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, is_overdue = #{isOverdue,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id ,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update cl_borrow
user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
order_no = #{orderNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
amount = #{amount,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
real_amount = #{realAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
fee = #{fee,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
time_limit = #{timeLimit,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
state = #{state,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
again = #{again,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
card_id = #{cardId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
service_fee = #{serviceFee,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
info_auth_fee = #{infoAuthFee,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
interest = #{interest,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
client = #{client,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
address = #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
coordinate = #{coordinate,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
remark = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ip = #{ip,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
sign_service_id = #{signServiceId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
is_overdue = #{isOverdue,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
where id = #{id ,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select:
select
from cl_borrow

select
from cl_borrow
mapper.update:
update cl_borrow
state = #{state,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
remark = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
amount = #{amount,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
real_amount = #{realAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
fee = #{fee,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
service_fee = #{serviceFee,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
info_auth_fee = #{infoAuthFee,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
interest = #{interest,jdbcType=DECIMAL}
where id = #{id ,jdbcType=BIGINT} AND state = 22
mapper.select:
select
from cl_borrow where user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=BIGINT} ORDER BY id DESC LIMIT 1

select
from cl_borrow WHERE user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=BIGINT} ORDER BY id DESC LIMIT 0,1

select
from cl_borrow
ORDER BY id DESC
SELECT cb.*, (SELECT card_no FROM cl_bank_card WHERE id = cb.card_id)AS cardNo, (SELECT bank FROM cl_bank_card WHERE id = cb.card_id)AS bank FROM cl_borrow AS cb

SELECT cb.id,cb.create_time AS createTime,cb.amount, (SELECT card_no FROM cl_bank_card WHERE id = cb.card_id)AS cardNo, (SELECT create_time FROM cl_borrow_progress WHERE state = 30 AND borrow_id = cb.id ORDER BY id ASC LIMIT 1) AS loanTime FROM `cl_borrow` AS cb WHERE state in (30,40,41,50) ORDER BY cb.id DESC LIMIT 0,10

SELECT cbr.id, cbr.borrow_id AS borrowId,cbr.repay_time,cbr.penalty_amout AS penaltyAmout,cbr.penalty_day AS penaltyDay, cb.amount,cb.real_amount,cb.fee,cb.state FROM cl_borrow_repay AS cbr,cl_borrow AS cb WHERE cbr.borrow_id = cb.id AND cbr.state = 20 AND cb.user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=BIGINT} ORDER BY cb.id DESC
SELECT cbr.repay_time,cb.amount,cbr.id AS id FROM cl_borrow_repay AS cbr,cl_borrow AS cb WHERE cbr.borrow_id = cb.id AND cbr.state = 20

select u.real_name,u.phone,b.id,b.user_id,b.order_no,b.amount,b.real_amount,b.fee,b.create_time, b.time_limit,p.state,b.card_id,b.service_fee,b.info_auth_fee,b.interest,b.client,b.remark from cl_borrow b left join cl_user_base_info u on u.user_id=b.user_id LEFT JOIN cl_borrow_progress p on p.borrow_id = b.id
and b.user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
and u.real_name like concat("%",#{realName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},"%")
and u.phone like concat("%",#{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR},"%")
and b.order_no like concat("%",#{orderNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},"%")
and p.state = #{state,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
ORDER BY b.id DESC

select u.real_name,u.phone,b.id,b.user_id,b.order_no,b.amount,b.real_amount,b.fee,b.create_time, b.time_limit,b.state,b.card_id,b.service_fee,b.info_auth_fee,b.interest,b.client,b.remark from cl_borrow b inner join cl_user_base_info u on u.user_id=b.user_id
ORDER BY b.id DESC

select u.real_name,u.phone,b.id,b.user_id,b.order_no,b.amount,b.real_amount,b.fee,b.create_time,b.time_limit,b.state,b.remark, l.amount+l.penalty_amout as repay_amount,l.repay_time,l.penalty_amout,l.penalty_day,b.again,b.is_overdue,card.card_no, (SELECT c.name FROM cl_channel c where c.id = r.channel_id) as channel_name,l.repay_way from cl_borrow b left join cl_user_base_info u on u.user_id=b.user_id left join
(select * from cl_borrow_repay_log where type = #{type,jdbcType=VARCHAR}) l
cl_borrow_repay_log l
on l.borrow_id=b.id left join cl_user r on r.id=b.user_id left join
(select * from cl_bank_card where agree_company = #{agreeCompany,jdbcType=VARCHAR}) card
cl_bank_card card
on u.user_id = card.user_id
ORDER BY b.create_time DESC

SELECT cu.id AS userId,cu.login_name AS phone,cbc.id AS cardId,cbc.card_no AS cardNo FROM cl_bank_card AS cbc LEFT JOIN `cl_user` AS cu ON cbc.user_id = cu.id WHERE cu.id IN (SELECT cua.user_id FROM cl_user_auth AS cua WHERE cua.id_state = '30' AND cua.contact_state = '30' AND cua.bank_card_state = '30' AND cua.phone_state = '30')
mapper.update: update cl_borrow set state = #{state,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id ,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select:
select
from cl_borrow where state not in (21,27,40,41,303) and user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.update: update cl_borrow set state = #{state,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id ,jdbcType=BIGINT} and state IN(20,26,31,302)
mapper.select: SELECT count(1) FROM `cl_borrow` WHERE state IN (30,40,41,43,50,90) AND user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
SELECT count(1) FROM `cl_borrow` WHERE state IN (40,41) AND user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
SELECT IFNULL(SUM(cb.amount),0) FROM cl_borrow as cb left join cl_borrow_progress as cbp ON cb.id=cbp.borrow_id WHERE DATE(cbp.create_time) = CURDATE() and cbp.state IN(20,26)
select count(1) from cl_borrow where user_id=#{userId,jdbcType=BIGINT} and (state = 40 or state = 41)
mapper.update: update cl_borrow set state = #{state,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id ,jdbcType=BIGINT} and state != 40

update cl_borrow
state = #{state,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
remark = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
where id = #{id ,jdbcType=BIGINT} AND (state = 301 or state = 31)
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT b.user_id) FROM `cl_borrow` b LEFT JOIN cl_user u ON b.user_id = u.id WHERE TO_DAYS(u.regist_time) >= TO_DAYS(#{startTime,jdbcType=BIGINT}) AND TO_DAYS(u.regist_time) <= TO_DAYS(#{endTime,jdbcType=BIGINT}) AND u.channel_id = #{channelId,jdbcType=BIGINT}

SELECT COUNT(b.user_id) FROM `cl_borrow` b LEFT JOIN cl_user u ON b.user_id = u.id WHERE TO_DAYS(u.regist_time) >= TO_DAYS(#{startTime,jdbcType=BIGINT}) AND TO_DAYS(u.regist_time) <= TO_DAYS(#{endTime,jdbcType=BIGINT}) AND u.channel_id = #{channelId,jdbcType=BIGINT}

SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT b.user_id) FROM `cl_borrow` b LEFT JOIN cl_user u ON b.user_id = u.id WHERE state NOT IN (10,21,22,27) AND TO_DAYS(u.regist_time) >= TO_DAYS(#{startTime,jdbcType=BIGINT}) AND TO_DAYS(u.regist_time) <= TO_DAYS(#{endTime,jdbcType=BIGINT}) AND u.channel_id = #{channelId,jdbcType=BIGINT}

SELECT COUNT(b.user_id) FROM `cl_borrow` b LEFT JOIN cl_user u ON b.user_id = u.id WHERE state NOT IN (10,21,22,27) AND TO_DAYS(u.regist_time) >= TO_DAYS(#{startTime,jdbcType=BIGINT}) AND TO_DAYS(u.regist_time) <= TO_DAYS(#{endTime,jdbcType=BIGINT}) AND u.channel_id = #{channelId,jdbcType=BIGINT}

SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT b.user_id) FROM `cl_borrow` b LEFT JOIN cl_user u ON b.user_id = u.id WHERE state NOT IN (30,40,41,50,90) AND TO_DAYS(u.regist_time) >= TO_DAYS(#{startTime,jdbcType=BIGINT}) AND TO_DAYS(u.regist_time) <= TO_DAYS(#{endTime,jdbcType=BIGINT}) AND u.channel_id = #{channelId,jdbcType=BIGINT}

SELECT COUNT(b.user_id) FROM `cl_borrow` b LEFT JOIN cl_user u ON b.user_id = u.id WHERE state NOT IN (30,40,41,50,90) AND TO_DAYS(u.regist_time) >= TO_DAYS(#{startTime,jdbcType=BIGINT}) AND TO_DAYS(u.regist_time) <= TO_DAYS(#{endTime,jdbcType=BIGINT}) AND u.channel_id = #{channelId,jdbcType=BIGINT}

SELECT SUM(b.amount) FROM `cl_borrow` b LEFT JOIN cl_user u ON b.user_id = u.id WHERE state NOT IN (10,21,22,27) AND TO_DAYS(u.regist_time) >= TO_DAYS(#{startTime,jdbcType=BIGINT}) AND TO_DAYS(u.regist_time) <= TO_DAYS(#{endTime,jdbcType=BIGINT}) AND u.channel_id = #{channelId,jdbcType=BIGINT}

SELECT SUM(b.amount) FROM `cl_borrow` b LEFT JOIN cl_user u ON b.user_id = u.id WHERE state NOT IN (10,20,21,22,26,27) AND TO_DAYS(u.regist_time) >= TO_DAYS(#{startTime,jdbcType=BIGINT}) AND TO_DAYS(u.regist_time) <= TO_DAYS(#{endTime,jdbcType=BIGINT}) AND u.channel_id = #{channelId,jdbcType=BIGINT}

SELECT COUNT(b.user_id) FROM `cl_borrow` b LEFT JOIN cl_user u ON b.user_id = u.id WHERE state NOT IN (50,90) AND TO_DAYS(u.regist_time) >= TO_DAYS(#{startTime,jdbcType=BIGINT}) AND TO_DAYS(u.regist_time) <= TO_DAYS(#{endTime,jdbcType=BIGINT}) AND u.channel_id = #{channelId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.update:
update cl_borrow
user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
order_no = #{orderNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
amount = #{amount,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
real_amount = #{realAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
fee = #{fee,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
time_limit = #{timeLimit,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
state = #{state,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
again = #{again,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
card_id = #{cardId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
service_fee = #{serviceFee,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
info_auth_fee = #{infoAuthFee,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
interest = #{interest,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
client = #{client,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
address = #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
coordinate = #{coordinate,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
remark = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ip = #{ip,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
sign_service_id = #{signServiceId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
where id = #{id ,jdbcType=BIGINT} and state = #{preState,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select date_format(b.create_time, '%Y%m%d') loan_date, '(1000,5000]' loan_amount, (case when b.state >= 30 and b.state < 100 then 'ACCEPT' when b.state = 21 or b.state = 27 or b.state = 303 then 'REJECT' when b.state < 27 or b.state = 301 or b.state = 302 then 'IN_PROGRESS' end) approval_status, (case when b.state = 50 or b.state = 90 then 'OVERDUE' when b.state = 40 or b.state = 41 then 'COMPLETED' when b.state >= 30 and b.state < 100 then 'NORMAL' else null end) loan_status, (case when b.state = 50 or b.state = 90 then '(1000,5000]' else null end) overdue_amount, (case when b.state = 50 or b.state = 90 then r.penalty_day else null end) overdue_status, (case when b.state = 50 or b.state = 90 then 1 else null end) overdue_total, 1 periods, 'CREDIT' loan_type from cl_borrow b left join cl_urge_repay_order r on b.id = r.borrow_id where b.user_id = #{userId ,jdbcType=BIGINT};

select IFNULL(b.id,-99999) id,IFNULL(u.phone,-99999) phone,IFNULL(u.id_no,-99999) id_no, IFNULL(u.live_addr,-99999) live_addr,IFNULL(ec.phone,-99999) as emer_phone,IFNULL(u.company_name,-99999) company_name, IFNULL(d.xd_is_lastloan_refused,-99999) xd_is_lastloan_refused, IFNULL(d.xd_total_loan_count,-99999) xd_total_loan_count, IFNULL(d.xd_total_overdue_count,-99999) xd_total_overdue_count, pa_l4mwdcn_a_dur_one_nums, IFNULL(d.`pa_l6mwdcn_a_dur_one_nums`,-99999) pa_l6mwdcn_a_dur_one_nums, IFNULL(d.`pa_l1mdtcnwk_rank_count`,-99999) pa_l1mdtcnwk_rank_count, IFNULL(d.`pa_l1wdtcnrt_rank_count`,-99999) pa_l1wdtcnrt_rank_count, IFNULL(d.`pa_l2mdtcn_rank_count`,-99999) pa_l2mdtcn_rank_count, IFNULL(d.`pa_l3wwdcnwk_rank_count`,-99999) pa_l3wwdcnwk_rank_count, IFNULL(d.`pa_l1mevcnrt_sepcial_hour_count`,-99999) pa_l1mevcnrt_sepcial_hour_count, IFNULL(d.`pa_l1mmncnwk_sepcial_hour_count`,-99999) pa_l1mmncnwk_sepcial_hour_count, IFNULL(d.`pa_l1wevcn_sepcial_hour_count`,-99999) pa_l1wevcn_sepcial_hour_count, IFNULL(d.`pa_l1wwdcnrt_sepcial_hour_count`,-99999) pa_l1wwdcnrt_sepcial_hour_count, IFNULL(d.`pa_l2mevcn_sepcial_hour_count`,-99999) pa_l2mevcn_sepcial_hour_count, IFNULL(d.`pa_l2mevcnrt_sepcial_hour_count`,-99999) pa_l2mevcnrt_sepcial_hour_count, IFNULL(d.`pa_l2mwdcn_sepcial_hour_count`,-99999) pa_l2mwdcn_sepcial_hour_count, IFNULL(d.`pa_l3mevcn_sepcial_hour_count`,-99999) pa_l3mevcn_sepcial_hour_count, IFNULL(d.`pa_l3mwdcnrt_sepcial_hour_count`,-99999) pa_l3mwdcnrt_sepcial_hour_count, IFNULL(d.`pa_l6mwdcnwk_sepcial_hour_count`,-99999) pa_l6mwdcnwk_sepcial_hour_count, IFNULL(d.`pa_l2mdtcn_active_days_count`,-99999) pa_l2mdtcn_active_days_count, IFNULL(d.`pa_l2wwdcn_active_days_count`,-99999) pa_l2wwdcn_active_days_count, IFNULL(d.`pa_l3mwdcnrt_active_days_count`,-99999) pa_l3mwdcnrt_active_days_count, IFNULL(d.`pa_l2wdtcn_max_times_in`,-99999) pa_l2wdtcn_max_times_in, IFNULL(d.`pa_l2wevcn_max_days_of_one_number_count`,-99999) pa_l2wevcn_max_days_of_one_number_count, IFNULL(d.`pa_l3mwdcnrt_max_days_of_one_number_count`,-99999) pa_l3mwdcnrt_max_days_of_one_number_count, IFNULL(d.`pa_l3wwdcn_max_days_of_one_number_count`,-99999) pa_l3wwdcn_max_days_of_one_number_count, IFNULL(d.`pa_l2wwdcn_a_dur_one_nums_in`,-99999) pa_l2wwdcn_a_dur_one_nums_in, IFNULL(d.`pa_l2wwdcn_t_times_in`,-99999) pa_l2wwdcn_t_times_in,IFNULL(d.`pa_l3mwdcn_a_dur_in`,-99999) pa_l3mwdcn_a_dur_in, IFNULL(d.`pa_l1mevcnrt_t_dur`,-99999) pa_l1mevcnrt_t_dur,IFNULL(d.`pa_l1mmncnwk_t_dur`,-99999) pa_l1mmncnwk_t_dur, IFNULL(d.`pa_l2mevcn_t_dur`,-99999) pa_l2mevcn_t_dur,IFNULL(d.`pa_l2mwdcnrt_t_dur`,-99999) pa_l2mwdcnrt_t_dur, IFNULL(d.`pa_l3mevcn_t_dur`,-99999) pa_l3mevcn_t_dur, IFNULL(d.`pa_l3mwdcnrt_t_dur`,-99999) pa_l3mwdcnrt_t_dur, IFNULL(d.`pa_l6mwdcnwk_t_dur`,-99999) pa_l6mwdcnwk_t_dur, IFNULL(d.`pa_l4mwdcn_t_dur`,-99999) pa_l4mwdcn_t_dur, IFNULL(d.`pa_l6mwdcn_min_ttv_days_in`,-99999) pa_l6mwdcn_min_ttv_days_in, IFNULL(d.`pa_l6mwdcn_t_dur_f`,-99999) pa_l6mwdcn_t_dur_f,IFNULL(d.`pa_all25acfri_dur`,-99999) pa_all25acfri_dur, IFNULL(d.`pa_allwdacwk_dur`,-99999) pa_allwdacwk_dur,IFNULL(d.`pa_all25ac_times`,-99999) pa_all25ac_times, IFNULL(d.`create_time`,-99999) create_time,IFNULL(d.`last_modify_time`,-99999) last_modify_time, CASE br.state WHEN 10 THEN '已还款' WHEN 20 THEN '未还款' ELSE '-99999' END as is_repay, IFNULL(br.penalty_day,-99999) penalty_day from `cl_borrow` b left join `cl_user_base_info` u on b.user_id = u.user_id left join (select * from cl_user_emer_contacts where type = 10) ec on b.user_id = ec.user_id left join `cl_decision` d on b.id = d.borrow_id left join `cl_borrow_repay` br on b.id=br.borrow_id where b.id = #{borrowId ,jdbcType=BIGINT};;
